name: Cella - Demo
description:
THE GAME

The Demo for Cella!

Explore the atmospheric world of ‘Cella’ in a 2.5D side-scroller style. Solve basic puzzles and make leaps across deadly gaps in an old facility that's been taken over by a scary and mysterious type of creature! Come across creatures that aren't happy about your presents and blast them to pieces with your laser rifle… when it's active. 

FEATURES
  • Tight character controls let you move about the world
  • A powerful laser rifle lets you rip your enemies apart
  • Enemies made from globs of flesh, ready to attack
  • An environment that feels alive and ready to be explored
  • Puzzles to be solved in order to progress through the world
CONTROLLS

XBOX Controller - 

A - Jump

X - Interact

B - Crouch/Slide

LT - Aim

RT - Fire

PC Controls - 

Space - Jump

Left Ctrl - Interact

Down - Crouch/Slide

Left Shift - Aim

Right Ctrl - Fire
